bibl.title: P. Köln XI 431 and its 'Genre': a Suggestion.
bibl.note: P. Köln XI, 431 (= M.-P.3 1965.44). The papyrus seems much more likely to be a Hellenistic παίγνιον, possibly even complete in itself, than part of a entire play-text, satyr-play or not. - See also: Peter PARSONS, P. Köln XI 431: A Further Note, ibidem, pp. 15-16.
COLLARD Christopher, P. Köln XI 431 and its 'Genre': a Suggestion.
